# Coding Resources for Conservation Scientists

Updated: 2025-02-13

This site contains a growing list of resources and tutorials to enable conservation and citizen scientists to conduct reproducible analyses:

- Create a Github repository to host code and data
- Acquire species and environmental data using R
- Develop species distribution models using R
- Develop simple Shiny apps
- Useful resources e.g., bookmarks, online tutorials, tips, etc.
